main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Mt. Lebanon, Pittsburgh, PA on July 20, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as a star-like light, The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds, The observing witness was a 59-year-old salesman with experience in aviation astronomy, The report suggested the observing period coincided with a meteor shower, There were no photographs or physical evidence associated with the sighting.
witness description: a 59-year-old salesman, good watch, aviation astronomer, 5'11", 180 lbs
